title: help game is having issues
body: So basically, I play on a Macbook at home and my game always used to work perfectly fine. I'd usually have 60-70 ping which is fine with me. but recently, my client has been very laggy and slow and every time Im queueing in ranked games my client just completely freezes during champ select and i just lose lp. once or twice ive been able to finally get in a game but when i do, my game is just unplayable. Im not lagging but my whole game is slow. Idk how to explain it but the game is super sluggish and everything i do is delayed and glitchy and the sounds are distorted like a crackling sound. also when im trying to levelup an ability, i click the  ablility and hear the level up noise but the indicator just freezes and it shows the point into the ability but the level up icon just stays there. i really cant play and have no idea what the problem is. How do i fix this??? thanks

replies.body: It almost sounds like you're experiencing some packet loss as opposed to the usual type of lag. Let's test for that really quick using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let it scan you latest game logs that had issues, take a screenshot, and post it here so we can go over it together.
how do i upload the screnshot
Try using something like Gyazo or Imgur. Once the image is uploaded you can copy and paste the image url here and I can see.

Yiiiiiip looks like some packet loss alright =\ . Most of the time packet loss originates on the ISP side of things, but our tech guys might still be able to figure something out. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs, and they'll be able to look through them to see what's up.
